short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically refreshes the current page at a user-specified interval.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Auto Refresh PRO is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension designed to streamline your web browsing experience. Whether you're monitoring live data, waiting for updates, or simply want to keep your favorite websites up-to-date, Auto Refresh PRO is the solution you've been looking for.

Key Features:

Customizable Refresh Intervals: Tailor the auto-refresh frequency to suit your needs, ensuring that the content is always up to date.
Multiple Tabs Support: Auto-refresh multiple tabs simultaneously, saving you time and effort.
Smart Detection: Intelligent page monitoring detects changes and triggers a refresh automatically, so you never miss an update.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive settings make it easy for users of all levels to set up and use Auto Refresh PRO.
How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open the website you want to auto-refresh.
Customize refresh settings using the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Why Auto Refresh PRO?

Boost productivity by automating the process of keeping information current.
Stay on top of live data, breaking news, or dynamic content effortlessly.
Save time by eliminating the need for manual refreshes.
Privacy and Security:
Auto Refresh PRO prioritizes user privacy and security. It does not collect or store any personal information.

Compatibility:
Compatible with Chrome on Windows, macOS, and Linux.
